description: Returns a list of security standards controls. For each control, the results include information about whether it is currently enabled, the severity, and a link to remediation information. This operation returns an empty list for standard subscriptions where StandardsControlsUpdatable has value NOT_READY_FOR_UPDATES.

parameters.name: StandardsSubscriptionArn
parameters.description: The ARN of a resource that represents your subscription to a supported standard. To get the subscription ARNs of the standards you have enabled, use the GetEnabledStandards operation.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is required for pagination. On your first call to the DescribeStandardsControls operation, set the value of this parameter to NULL. For subsequent calls to the operation, to continue listing data, set the value of this parameter to the value returned from the previous response.

nested_items.name: Controls
nested_items.description: A list of security standards controls.

nested_items.name: StandardsControlArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the security standard control.

nested_items.name: ControlStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the security standard control. Indicates whether the control is enabled or disabled. Security Hub does not check against disabled controls.

nested_items.name: DisabledReason
nested_items.description: The reason provided for the most recent change in status for the control.

nested_items.name: ControlStatusUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the status of the security standard control was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: ControlId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the security standard control.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the security standard control.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The longer description of the security standard control. Provides information about what the control is checking for.

nested_items.name: RemediationUrl
nested_items.description: A link to remediation information for the control in the Security Hub user documentation.

nested_items.name: SeverityRating
nested_items.description: The severity of findings generated from this security standard control.

nested_items.name: RelatedRequirements
nested_items.description: The list of requirements that are related to this control.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to request the next page of results.
